item.description: The Children Theatrical Studio of RCLA (The Russian Center for Languages and Arts) presents new musicals for kids: "Skazka pro kozlyat na novyi lad" by A. Rybnikov and "Duimovochka" (Thumbelina) by Eu. Krylatov. Tickets: $5 for children 3 & up and adults, kids under 3 - free. It you have any questions feel free to contact Tatiana Barankova (RCLA): tatiana.barankova@gmail.com

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Musical Performance for Children
